default.message: Something went wrong, please try again

askExpected.message: Tell me what you plan to do today?

askReal.message: Tell me what you did today?

askDiff.message: Tell me, regarding what you expected how do you think your day was?

equalDay.message: You did what you planned to do today, good job!

betterDay.message: You did more than you planned to do today, good job!

worseDay.message: You did less than you planned to do today, but that's ok, tomorrow is a new day!
